title: What is the meaning of resident doctors?

og.title: What is the meaning of resident doctors?
og.description:
Answer (1 of 20): It goes something like this:

Undergraduate Degree (4 years or so)

Medical School (4 years)

Intern (1 year- counted as first year of residency)

Residency (three years or more depending on chosen field)

Fellowship (specialization in specific field, like plastic or reconstruct...
